updated.description: Optional UTC timestamp for the last update time in ISO 8601 format that is automatically assigned.

group.description: Optional group to which the content belongs.

versions.description: Optional list of services and versions related to the content.

brief.description: Optional brief description of the content.

filename.description: Optional filename that that defines automatically used filename when content is exported.

source.description: Optional external source for the snippet.

created.description: Optional UTC timestamp for creation time in ISO 8601 format that is automatically assigned.

data.description: Mandatory content data in list context with one line per element.

digest.description: Automatically assigned message digest that uniquely identifies the content.

uuid.description: Automatically assigned UUID for the content.
